I think there is something wrong with Mitigation point calculation.

Rawr 4.1.1.0
WorkItem.Summary: [Bear] Optimizer suggests reforging all my gear to expertise instead of dodge

Comments.Message: You've got the bugged default values for boss attacks that includes parry haste.
Change the selector to "The Average Boss" then edit your "Avg Melee" attack to not Parry Haste. Net version will no longer have this issue.

Thanks for pointing that out. I just import my char from Rawr addon, and leave all by default. I used to do this all the time and it works fine until 4.1.1 came out. Maybe there is something broken in the import module?

By the way, I change the setting as Jothay suggested, and it seems expertise is still preferred over mastery, is it intended or I didn't setup correctly? (See bear2.xml)
try turning your threat scale down. Other than that I dont know what to tell you other than to wait for next version
